channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 台湾选出议会议长执政党观点亲中
item.description: Taiwan's parliament on Thursday elected a former presidential candidate for the largest opposition party as its new speaker, who will be responsible for hosting visiting foreign lawmakers and who the ruling party has said is pro-China.翻译:台湾议会周四选举最大反对党的前总统候选人为新议长，他将负责接待来访的外国议员，执政党称他是亲中国的。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：英伟达面向中国的新型人工智能芯片将以与华为产品相似的价格出售
item.description: Nvidia has started taking pre-orders for a new China-specific artificial intelligence (AI) chip from distributors who are pricing it on par with a rival product from Huawei, sources familiar with the matter said.翻译:知情人士称，英伟达已开始接受经销商预订一款新的中国专用人工智能芯片，这些芯片的定价与华为的竞争对手产品相当。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh

item.title: 美国称越南稀土产量随中国经济增长而下降
item.description: The U.S. geological agency has sharply revised down estimates on Vietnam's rare earths output and expects a further drop despite its rich resource base, according to an annual report, which showed a rise in dominant producer China's output.翻译:根据一份年度报告，美国地质机构大幅下调了对越南稀土产量的预估，并预计尽管越南资源基础丰富，但产量仍将进一步下降，该报告显示，主要生产国中国的产量有所增加。
item.author: Francesco Guarascio

item.title: 菲律宾计划购买潜艇以捍卫南海主权——高级官员
item.description: Philippines President Ferdinand Marcos Jr has approved the third phase of the military's modernisation, which includes the purchase of the country's first submarine, in order to defend its maritime sovereignty in the disputed South China Sea.翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯已批准军队现代化的第三阶段，其中包括购买该国第一艘潜艇，以捍卫其在有争议的南中国海的海洋主权。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车将停止资助 Polestar，可能将股份转让给吉利
item.description: Swedish automaker Volvo Cars said on Thursday it would stop providing funding to Polestar Automotive Holding , handing responsibility for the luxury car brand to China's Geely Holding which is also Volvo's top owner.翻译:瑞典汽车制造商沃尔沃汽车周四表示，将停止向北极星汽车控股公司提供资金，并将该豪华汽车品牌的责任移交给中国吉利控股公司，该公司也是沃尔沃汽车的最大所有者。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：对于市场来说，美联储推迟五月意味着更多
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.翻译:韦恩·科尔 (Wayne Cole) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 人权观察就中国强迫劳工风险向汽车制造商发出警告
item.description: Human Rights Watch urged automakers such as Tesla, Volkswagen and BYD to do more to ensure materials that could be made using Uyghur forced labour do not enter their supply chain.翻译:人权观察敦促特斯拉、大众和比亚迪等汽车制造商采取更多措施，确保可能使用维吾尔强迫劳动制造的材料不会进入其供应链。
item.author: Brenda Goh

item.title: 香港法院以2019年冲击立法会后骚乱罪判处四人有罪
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Thursday found four people guilty of rioting after the legislature of the financial centre was stormed during pro-democracy protests in 2019, joining eight others who had pleaded guilty to charges over the incident.翻译:周四，香港一家法院认定四人犯有 2019 年民主抗议活动期间冲击金融中心立法机关后发生的骚乱罪，另外八人也承认了对该事件的指控。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Edward Cho

item.title: 中国需求疲软，亚洲工厂举步维艰
item.description: Asia's factories delivered a largely patchy performance in January, surveys showed on Thursday, as soft Chinese demand left the region's economies on a shaky footing at the start of 2024.翻译:周四的调查显示，亚洲工厂 1 月份的表现基本参差不齐，因为中国需求疲软导致该地区经济在 2024 年初基础不稳定。
item.author: Leika Kihara

item.title: 中国承诺坚持财政扩张以刺激经济
item.description: China will maintain fiscal expansion this year to spur an economic recovery, Vice Finance Minister Wang Dongwei said on Thursday, reinforcing market views that public spending will be the government's main tool to lift growth.翻译:财政部副部长王东伟周四表示，中国今年将维持财政扩张，以刺激经济复苏，这强化了市场观点，即公共支出将是政府拉动经济增长的主要工具。
item.author: Kevin Yao, Ellen Zhang

item.title: 特斯拉中国对部分 Model Y 车型提供现金折扣
item.description: Tesla China is offering 8,000 yuan ($1,114) of cash discounts from Thursday for some types of Model Y vehicles, it said on its official social media account.翻译:特斯拉中国在其官方社交媒体账户上表示，从周四开始，特斯拉中国将针对部分型号的 Model Y 车辆提供 8,000 元人民币（1,114 美元）的现金折扣。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国新建住宅价格涨幅为近2-1/2年来最快——私人调查
item.description: China's new home prices rose in January at the fastest monthly pace in nearly 2-1/2 years, according to a survey released on Thursday, following a slew of government support measures and expectations of further relaxation in homebuying policies.翻译:周四发布的一项调查显示，在政府出台一系列支持措施以及购房政策进一步放松的预期之后，中国1月份新建住宅价格涨幅为近2-1/2年来最快。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 受降息预期提振油价小幅走高
item.description: Oil prices edged up on Thursday, supported by signals from the U.S. Federal Reserve on a possible start to rate cuts and as China unveiled new support measures for its embattled property market.翻译:受美联储可能开始降息的信号以及中国针对陷入困境的房地产市场推出新的支持措施的支撑，油价周四小幅上涨。
item.author: Katya Golubkova, Florence Tan

item.title: 美元逼近七周高点，因三月份美联储降息押注有所减少
item.description: The dollar held near a seven-week high against the euro on Thursday, reached after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell pushed back on the idea of a U.S. interest rate cut as soon as March.翻译:周四，美元兑欧元汇率维持在七周高点附近，这是在美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔推翻美国最早在三月份降息的想法后达到的。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 出口订单推动中国工厂活动扩大——财新PMI
item.description: China's factory activity expanded in January thanks to stable growth in output, quicker logistics and the first rise in new export orders since June, helping lift business confidence to a nine-month high, a private-sector survey showed on Thursday.翻译:周四的一项私营部门调查显示，由于产量稳定增长、物流加快以及新出口订单自 6 月以来首次增加，中国 1 月份工厂活动有所扩大，帮助将商业信心提升至九个月高点。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲经受美联储影响，债券仍指望降息
item.description: Asian shares steadied on Thursday as Chinese stocks eked out rare gains, while investors stuck to bets for sizable cuts in U.S. interest rates this year even if the kick off might now be a little later than first hoped.翻译:亚洲股市周四持稳，中国股市罕见上涨，而投资者仍押注美国今年将大幅降息，即使现在开始的时间可能比最初希望的要晚一些。
item.author: Wayne Cole

item.title: 芯片销量激增、中国反弹，韩国出口连续第四个月增长
item.description: South Korea's exports rose for a fourth month in January, as a rebound in sales to China and the biggest surge in chip shipments in six years provided a boost to the trade-reliant economy at the start of 2024.翻译:韩国 1 月份出口连续第四个月增长，原因是对中国的销售反弹以及六年来最大的芯片出货量激增，在 2024 年初提振了依赖贸易的经济。
item.author: Jihoon Lee, Cynthia Kim

item.title: 调查显示，在华美国企业略显乐观，但仍保持谨慎态度
item.description: U.S. businesses in China are feeling more optimistic about bilateral relations and their profitability potential than a year ago, but most will still limit new investment in the country for now, a survey published on Thursday showed.翻译:周四公布的一项调查显示，在华美国企业对双边关系及其盈利潜力比一年前更加乐观，但大多数企业目前仍会限制在华新投资。
item.author: Casey Hall

item.title: 美国指控中国公民向伊朗走私美国制造的电子产品
item.description: U.S. authorities have charged four Chinese nationals with crimes related to the smuggling of U.S.-made electronic components, including some with possible military use, to Iran, the Justice Department said on Wednesday.翻译:美国司法部周三表示，美国当局指控四名中国公民涉嫌向伊朗走私美国制造的电子元件，其中包括一些可能用于军事用途的电子元件。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 五角大楼呼吁中国公司帮助北京军方
item.description: The United States on Wednesday added more than a dozen Chinese companies to a list created by the Defense Department to highlight firms it says are allegedly working with Beijing's military, as part of a broader effort to keep American technology from aiding China.翻译:美国周三将十几家中国公司添加到国防部创建的名单中，以突出显示据称与北京军方合作的公司，作为阻止美国技术援助中国的更广泛努力的一部分。
item.author: Idrees Ali, Alexandra Alper, Michael Martina
